document.full_text: north and south sudan have agreed to negotiate an end to the crisis in the disputed abyei region, the southern vice president said monday, in an effort to defuse tensions ahead of the south's scheduled secession.
document.title: north, south sudan discuss abyei as tension simmers
lines_and_colors: north and south sudan have agreed to negotiate an end to the crisis in the disputed abyei region, the southern vice president said monday, in an effort to defuse tensions ahead of the south's scheduled secession.
